text:
My team ran 8 webinars in Q2. We have been doing at least 1/month, but typically more, for more than a year. 8 was aggressive and we are exhausted.
*Challenges*: Working with SMEs to get abstracts finalized on time and then slides built on time.
*Success:* Ultimate measure of success is number of opportunities / close won with webinar lead source, but that takes time. Early indicators: registrant, attendee & on-demand numbers; webinar engagement (downloads, questions submitted).
*Magic Wand:* More budget to get all the bells and whistles offered by ON25 (breakout rooms, etc) to increase engagement.

We are fortunate to have fantastic SMEs who are highly credible, entertaining and fantastic presenters. We use webinars as our core content and then repurpose for all other content assets.
